original_text: So Solomon did evil in the eyes of the Lord; he did not follow the Lord completely, as David his father had done.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 여호와의 눈앞에서 악을 행하여 그의 아버지 다윗이 여호와를 온전히 따름 같이 따르지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: So Solomon did evil in the eyes of the Lord;
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 솔로몬은 여호와 보시기에 악을 행했으며

sentences.original_text: he did not follow the Lord completely,
as David his father had done.
